document.full_text: the chicago bulls produced a stingy fourth quarter defensive effort to beat the atlanta hawks 95-83 on tuesday, which gave them a 3-2 eastern conference semi-final series lead.
document.title: bulls' stingy defense suffocates hawks, take 3-2 lead
lines_and_colors: the chicago bulls produced a stingy fourth quarter defensive effort to beat the atlanta hawks 95-83 on tuesday, which gave them a 3-2 eastern conference semi-final series lead.
